header-includes:
  - \usepackage{fontspec}
  - \setmainfont{Times New Roman}
  - \setsansfont{Times New Roman}
  - \setmonofont{Times New Roman}
  - \usepackage[fontsize=10pt]{fontsize}
  - \renewcommand{\familydefault}{\rmdefault}
  - \usepackage{sectsty}
  - \allsectionsfont{\normalfont\rmfamily}
  - \usepackage{float}

  - \usepackage{booktabs}
  - \usepackage{makecell}
  - \usepackage{graphicx}
  - \usepackage{array}
  - \usepackage{fancyhdr}
  - \usepackage{xcolor}
  - \pagestyle{fancy}
  - \newcolumntype{R}[1]{>{\raggedright\arraybackslash}p{#1}}
  - \setlength{\headheight}{30pt}
  - \fancyfoot[C]{Page \thepage\ of \pageref{LastPage}}
  - \usepackage{lastpage}
  - \usepackage{microtype}
  - \usepackage{ragged2e}
  - \usepackage{fvextra}
  - \usepackage[normalem]{ulem}
  - \usepackage{listings}

  - \sloppy

{% endraw -%}
{% if logo_path %}
  - \fancyhead[R]{\includegraphics[width=2cm, height=1.5cm, keepaspectratio]{{ "{" }}{{ logo_path }}{{ "}" }}}
  - \fancyhead[C]{}
  - \fancyhead[L]{}
  - \fancypagestyle{plain}{\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0.4pt}}
{% endif %}
output:
  pdf_document:
    latex_engine: xelatex
    extra_dependencies: ["xcolor"]
    pandoc_args: --listings
    toc: true
    toc_depth: 2
